about_the_game:
Hamsterball: Potato's Great Escape

Join Potato, the bravest hamster in the world, as he rolls through a house full of dangers in Hamsterball: Potato's Great Escape! Trapped inside his trusty hamster ball, Potato must navigate through treacherous rooms, avoiding hungry cats, stomping feet, and curious humans—all while hunting for his favorite snacks.

Help Potato steer clear of danger by mastering tight turns, dodging obstacles, and outsmarting his foes. Each room presents a new challenge, from a maze-like kitchen to a toy-strewn living room, with every corner holding the promise of delicious treats—or peril. Can you guide Potato safely through the house and out to freedom? Or will he be caught by one of his many foes?

Roll into this fast-paced adventure full of heart-pounding escapes, tricky puzzles, and adorable mayhem!
